Actor.CenterI1MessageCommand: %function(self) for i,v in pairs(mod_plr) do if v then v:bounceend(spb*.1) v:x(SCREEN_CENTER_X*1.25) v:rotationz(30) v:y(SCREEN_CENTER_Y*1.1) end end if vtd_bg0 then vtd_bg0:bounceend(spb*.1) vtd_bg0:x(SCREEN_CENTER_X*1.25) vtd_bg0:rotationz(30) vtd_bg0:y(SCREEN_CENTER_Y*1.1) end end
Actor.CenterI11MessageCommand: %function(self) for i,v in pairs(mod_plr) do if v then v:x(SCREEN_CENTER_X*1.25) v:rotationz(30) v:y(SCREEN_CENTER_Y*1.1) end end if vtd_bg0 then vtd_bg0:x(SCREEN_CENTER_X*1.25) vtd_bg0:rotationz(30) vtd_bg0:y(SCREEN_CENTER_Y*1.1) end if vtd_bgbar then vtd_bgbar:diffusealpha(1) end if vtd_bgbarc then vtd_bgbarc:queuecommand('Death') end end
Actor.CenterI2MessageCommand: %function(self) for i,v in pairs(mod_plr) do if v then v:bounceend(spb*.1) v:x(SCREEN_CENTER_X*.75) v:rotationz(-35) v:y(SCREEN_CENTER_Y*1.1) end end if vtd_bg0 then vtd_bg0:bounceend(spb*.1) vtd_bg0:x(SCREEN_CENTER_X*.75) vtd_bg0:rotationz(-35) vtd_bg0:y(SCREEN_CENTER_Y*1.1) end end
Actor.CenterIMessageCommand: %function(self) for i,v in pairs(mod_plr) do if v then v:bounceend(spb*.1) v:x(SCREEN_CENTER_X) v:rotationz(0) v:y(SCREEN_CENTER_Y) end end if vtd_bg0 then vtd_bg0:bounceend(spb*.1) vtd_bg0:x(SCREEN_CENTER_X) vtd_bg0:rotationz(0) vtd_bg0:y(SCREEN_CENTER_Y) end end
Actor.MinifyMessageCommand: %function(self) if vtd_bgch then vtd_bgch:decelerate(spb*2) vtd_bgch:zoom(.75) vtd_bgch:linear(spb*15) vtd_bgch:zoom(1) vtd_bgch:sleep(0) vtd_bgch:rotationz(360) vtd_bgch:bounceend(spb) vtd_bgch:rotationz(0) end end
Actor.HallifyMessageCommand: %function(self) if vtd_bgch then vtd_bgch:decelerate(spb*2) vtd_bgch:rotationx(-60) vtd_bgch:linear(spb*15) vtd_bgch:rotationx(0) end if vtd_counting then vtd_counting:decelerate(spb*2) vtd_counting:rotationx(-60) vtd_counting:y(SCREEN_CENTER_Y*.5) vtd_counting:linear(spb*15) vtd_counting:rotationx(0) vtd_counting:y(0) end end
Actor.TagDownMessageCommand: %function(self) if vtd_tutorial then vtd_tutorial:y(SCREEN_HEIGHT*.2) end if vtd_tutorialavy then vtd_tutorialavy:y(SCREEN_CENTER_Y*.5) vtd_tutorialavy:x(0) end end
Actor.fixavvyMessageCommand: %function(self) if vtd_tutorial then vtd_tutorial:y(SCREEN_HEIGHT*.8) end if vtd_tutorialavy then vtd_tutorialavy:y(SCREEN_CENTER_Y*-.5) vtd_tutorialavy:x(0) end end
Actor.WhiteMessageCommand: %function(self) if vtd_quad then vtd_quad:hidden(0) vtd_quad:diffusealpha(0) vtd_quad:linear(spb*4) vtd_quad:diffusealpha(1) end end
Actor.UnWhiteMessageCommand: %function(self) if vtd_quad then vtd_quad:linear(spb*2) vtd_quad:diffusealpha(0) end if vtd_bgch then vtd_bgch:hidden(1) end if vtd_bg0 then vtd_bg0:y(SCREEN_CENTER_Y) end end
Actor.MagnifyMessageCommand: %function(self) if vtd_bgch then vtd_bgch:decelerate(spb*1) vtd_bgch:zoom(1.1) vtd_bgch:linear(spb*8) vtd_bgch:zoom(0) vtd_bgch:y(SCREEN_CENTER_Y*.475) end if vtd_tutorialavy then vtd_tutorialavy:y(SCREEN_CENTER_Y*-.5) vtd_tutorialavy:x(0) end if vtd_tutorial then vtd_tutorial:y(SCREEN_HEIGHT*.8) end end
Actor.UnCenterMessageCommand: %function(self) for i,v in pairs(mod_plr) do if v then v:linear(spb*.1) v:x(SCREEN_CENTER_X + (i*2-3)*320) v:GetChild('Judgment'):linear(spb*.1) v:GetChild('Judgment'):x((i*2-3)*-160) v:GetChild('Combo'):linear(spb*.1) v:GetChild('Combo'):x((i*2-3)*-160) end end if vtd_bgd then vtd_bgd:hidden(0) vtd_bgd:diffusealpha(1) vtd_bgd:zoom(2) vtd_bgd:bouncebegin(spb) vtd_bgd:zoom(1) end end
Actor.CenterSMessageCommand: %function(self) for i,v in pairs(mod_plr) do if v then v:decelerate(spb*8) v:x(SCREEN_CENTER_X) v:GetChild('Judgment'):decelerate(spb*8) v:GetChild('Judgment'):x(SCREEN_CENTER_X*((i*2-3)*.5)) v:GetChild('Combo'):decelerate(spb*8) v:GetChild('Combo'):x(SCREEN_CENTER_X*((i*2-3)*.5)) end end end
Actor.CenterLolMessageCommand: %function(self) local tick = .5/9 for i,v in pairs(mod_plr) do if v then v:x(SCREEN_CENTER_X + (i*2-3)*(.5-1*tick)*640) v:bounceend(spb*.5) v:x(SCREEN_CENTER_X + (i*2-3)*(.5-2*tick)*640) v:bounceend(spb*.5) v:x(SCREEN_CENTER_X + (i*2-3)*(.5-3*tick)*640) v:bounceend(spb*.5) v:x(SCREEN_CENTER_X + (i*2-3)*(.5-4*tick)*640) v:bounceend(spb*.5) v:x(SCREEN_CENTER_X + (i*2-3)*(.5-5*tick)*640) v:bounceend(spb*.5) v:x(SCREEN_CENTER_X + (i*2-3)*(.5-6*tick)*640) v:bounceend(spb*.5) v:x(SCREEN_CENTER_X + (i*2-3)*(.5-7*tick)*640) v:bounceend(spb*.5) v:x(SCREEN_CENTER_X + (i*2-3)*(.5-8*tick)*640) v:bounceend(spb*.5) v:x(SCREEN_CENTER_X + (i*2-3)*(.5-9*tick)*640) end end end
Actor.BottomFallMessageCommand: %function(self) for i,v in pairs(mod_plr) do if v then v:accelerate(spb*1.75) v:y(SCREEN_HEIGHT*1.5) v:sleep(spb*.25) v:y(SCREEN_CENTER_Y) end end if vtd_bg0 then vtd_bg0:accelerate(spb*1.75) vtd_bg0:y(SCREEN_HEIGHT*1.5) end if vtd_bgch then vtd_bgch:hidden(0) vtd_bgch:sleep(spb*2) vtd_bgch:linear(spb) vtd_bgch:diffusealpha(1) end if vtd_tutorial then vtd_tutorial:accelerate(spb*2) vtd_tutorial:y(SCREEN_HEIGHT*.8) end if vtd_tutorialavy then vtd_tutorialavy:accelerate(spb*2) vtd_tutorialavy:y(SCREEN_CENTER_Y*-.5) end if vtd_bgbar then vtd_bgbar:queuecommand('FuckingHell') end if vtd_bgbarc then vtd_bgbarc:queuecommand('Chow') end end
Actor.QuikSpinMessageCommand: %function(self) for i,v in pairs(mod_plr) do if v then v:rotationz(180*(i*2-3)) v:decelerate(spb) v:rotationz(0) end end end
Actor.Bounce1MessageCommand: %function(self) for i,v in pairs(mod_plr) do if v then v:bob() v:effectmagnitude(10*(i*2-3),0,0) v:effectclock('bgm') end end end
Actor.Bounce2MessageCommand: %function(self) for i,v in pairs(mod_plr) do if v then v:bob() v:effectmagnitude(20*(i*2-3),0,0) end end end
Actor.Bounce3MessageCommand: %function(self) for i,v in pairs(mod_plr) do if v then v:bob() v:effectmagnitude(30*(i*2-3),0,0) end end end
Actor.Bounce4MessageCommand: %function(self) for i,v in pairs(mod_plr) do if v then v:bob() v:effectmagnitude(40*(i*2-3),0,0) end end end
Actor.BounceYMessageCommand: %function(self) for i,v in pairs(mod_plr) do if v then v:bob() v:effectmagnitude(0,30*(i*2-3),0) end end end
Actor.BounceZMessageCommand: %function(self) for i,v in pairs(mod_plr) do if v then v:bob() v:effectmagnitude(0,0,175*(i*2-3)) end end end
Actor.SquishMessageCommand: %function(self) for i,v in pairs(mod_plr) do if v then v:decelerate(spb*3) v:zoomy(0) v:bounceend(spb*.5) v:zoomy(1) end end if vtd_bgd then vtd_bgd:decelerate(spb*3) vtd_bgd:zoomy(0) vtd_bgd:sleep(0) vtd_bgd:diffusealpha(0) end if vtd_bgch then vtd_bgch:sleep(spb*3) vtd_bgch:y(SCREEN_CENTER_Y) vtd_bgch:zoomy(0) vtd_bgch:zoomx(1) vtd_bgch:bounceend(spb*.5) vtd_bgch:zoomy(1) end end
Actor.breathMessageCommand:
%function(self) for i,v in pairs(mod_plr) do if v then
local breath_parity = 1 for j=1,9,1 do v:bounceend(spb*.5) v:rotationx(breath_parity*(30+4*j)) v:zoomz((j/2+.5)) v:sleep(spb*.5) breath_parity = breath_parity*-1 end end end if vtd_bg0 then local breath_parity = 1 for j=1,9,1 do vtd_bg0:bounceend(spb*.5) vtd_bg0:rotationx(breath_parity*(30+4*j)) vtd_bg0:y(breath_parity*(j/9)*-.2*SCREEN_HEIGHT + SCREEN_HEIGHT*.5) vtd_bg0:zoomy((j/9)*.75+1) vtd_bg0:zoomz((j/2+.5)) vtd_bg0:sleep(spb*.5) breath_parity = breath_parity*-1 end end end
Actor.breath2MessageCommand: %function(self) for i,v in pairs(mod_plr) do if v then for j=1,4,1 do v:bounceend(spb) v:rotationx(70+5*j) v:sleep(spb) end end end if vtd_bg0 then for j=10,13,1 do vtd_bg0:bounceend(spb) vtd_bg0:rotationx((38+5*j)) vtd_bg0:y(-.2*SCREEN_HEIGHT + SCREEN_HEIGHT*.5) --vtd_bg0:zoomy((j/9)*.75+1) vtd_bg0:sleep(spb) end end end
Actor.breathoutMessageCommand: %function(self) for i,v in pairs(mod_plr) do if v then v:decelerate(spb*3) v:rotationx(0) end end if vtd_bg0 then vtd_bg0:decelerate(spb*5) vtd_bg0:rotationx(0) vtd_bg0:y(SCREEN_HEIGHT*.5) vtd_bg0:zoomy(1) vtd_bg0:zoomz(1) end end
Actor.KyixerciseMessageCommand: %function(self) if vtd_hips then vtd_hips:hidden(0) vtd_hips:decelerate(spb) vtd_hips:y(SCREEN_HEIGHT*.8) end end
Actor.Kyixercise2MessageCommand: %function(self) if vtd_hips then vtd_hips:accelerate(spb*.5) vtd_hips:y(SCREEN_HEIGHT*1.2) vtd_hips:queuecommand('HideSelf') end if vtd_legs then vtd_legs:hidden(0) vtd_legs:sleep(spb*.5) vtd_legs:decelerate(spb*.5) vtd_legs:y(SCREEN_HEIGHT*.2) --vtd_legs:queuecommand('HideSelf') end end
Actor.EndxerciseMessageCommand: %function(self) if vtd_legs then vtd_legs:accelerate(spb) vtd_legs:y(SCREEN_HEIGHT*-.3) vtd_legs:queuecommand('HideSelf') end end
